thread.section_title: Bolt Depot Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bolt Depot | www.boltdepot.com
thread.title: Mike B
thread.title_full: Bolt Depot reviewed by Mike B

author: Mike B
title: Mike B
text: I needed to order screws, washers and nuts that the local hardware stores did not carry. I found the items easily on Bolt Depot's website. They have a great selection. The process from selecting the product through payment confirmation was easy. The shipment arrived quickly and the items were individually packaged and labeled. I will order from them again without hesitation. Thank you.
